LanguageData.CommandDesignateTributeDesc: If activated, Imperial authorities are allowed to claim this container.
LanguageData.CommandEnableRessourceLoadDesc: If activated this container will be filled with ressources.
LanguageData.MessageTributeLoadingStarted: The haulers from {0} will now start loading resource packs.
LanguageData.MessageTributeLeaving: The freighter from {0} have loaded all resource packs and are leaving.
LanguageData.CommandDebugFillResourceDesc: Fills the container with random resources.
